note:
heyo, i'm doskel (all lowercase, I swear to god if you capitalize my name)! a crowbar-wielding freerunning cyber ninja.
also a terrible amateur radio operator, even worse programmer, massive *nix nerd, and hobby grass-toucher. i like to play with (and fail to daily drive) funky unixes from time to time, and you might also find me outside riding bikes or hiking/climbing. i also enjoy talking to people! if you've ever got something to discuss or vent or infodump about, i'd be happy to chat.

also: i am a literal child. be sfw in my replies and we'll get on fine.

crime cohort and #1 enemy: @demi

you know, the good old days weren't always good
and tomorrow ain't as bad as it seems
